name: Forbidden Confessions: My Nanny Experience
description:
ABOUT

As the 3rd entry of our Forbidden Confessions series, My Nanny Experience entails the confession story of Agatha, a 19-year-old high school graduating student who took the job as a babysitter due to financial needs.

Willing to do anything to save enough money for college, Agatha found herself tangled in a series of encounters and affairs with Mr. Grant and her step brother Andrew.

This is supposed to be a casual babysitting part-time job... until it wasn't.
